Posts.EditableText: I went to a website looking for software for a chipped xbox, and it came up with a list of developers.  I scroll down to the bottom, and I find Axe Software's name and site listed!  Anyone who's interested can find the page [url=http://xbox.gamezone.com/publinks/company.htm:tgovz3ep]here[/url:tgovz3ep]
